name: MKX
title: MK X
author: Siffer & Tyfl0n
description: This mod adds an extra mk for the things you love in Factorio. Power Armor mk 3? You got it! Speed-, Efficiency-, and Productivity module 4? Most definitely! Productivity modules can now be placed in Beacons, while the Productivity module 4 does not have recipe-based limitations. Enjoy :D -Siffer & Tyflon
